channel.title: Nulls logging on when i have erased the no-ip address. I really need help:\
channel.description:
So i erased my no-ip address and nulls keep logging on from this ip: 74.115.3.62 WTF IS GOING ON?! Every time i start it they just crash it I have tried like 14 different sources and NOTHING Im like so confused the thing is that ip is kind of close to my ip (except the second digit) and i have an internet tv and im wondering if something is interfering? i dunno:( please help im using an allstar base but its a clean base without the glitches the source has anti null and stuff i really dont get what is going on i really need help:(' i ALSO ip banned it from the server. did nothing
heres my runserver: [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg528/scaled.php?server=528&filename=wtffuckingnu.jpg&res=medium[/img]

item.title: Nulls logging on when i have erased the no-ip address. I really need help:\
item.dc:creator: @apocalypsescape apocalypsescape
item.description:
@apocalypsescape wrote:

thanks for the replies but it kinda fixed itself
i dunno what went on

Read full topic
item.source: Nulls logging on when i have erased the no-ip address. I really need help:\

item.title: Nulls logging on when i have erased the no-ip address. I really need help:\
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

[quote=“Tutorial, post:9, topic:434538”][quote author=ultimatepkvillage link=topic=537255.msg3929348#msg3929348 date=1330540629]
the person who is nulling the server either has an ip changer program, so it wouldn’t matter if you put him in ip ban or ban text files which means they could be DDosing which is illegal or it could not be someone spamming it could have been from non-properly coded anti-null & is causing this to happen.
[/quote]
There is no possible way a denied address can gain access through a properly protected router/modem unless the person is using a proxy.[/quote]
Most RSPS block the local IP address, which can be changed.

OT: I suggest adding a check in initialize() checking for the first two number ‘74.115’ and ip ban them.

Read full topic

item.title: Nulls logging on when i have erased the no-ip address. I really need help:\
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

ultimatepkvillage:

the person who is nulling the server either has an ip changer program, so it wouldn’t matter if you put him in ip ban or ban text files which means they could be DDosing which is illegal or it could not be someone spamming it could have been from non-properly coded anti-null & is causing this to happen.

There is no possible way a denied address can gain access through a properly protected router/modem unless the person is using a proxy.

Read full topic

[quote=“apocalypsescape, post:6, topic:434538”]omg=
has this ever happened to anyone else?
i have such shitty luck

and dude first of all chill it on the caps.
second, ill leave the forums once i get an answer that makes sense
im glad you gave me an example, i tried it and it didnt work.
after 2 days of trying to fix this im frustrated and all i want is to
solve this damn thing and get my server online.
Ive posted this again because ive lost patience and i just want to solve this problem.[/quote]
just look this up on google
“site:moparisthebest.com allstar anti null”
should be the first result, it’s in all caps.
